::Spears::

She smiled at him. "It's ok.  It's just that I can't go back."
She sighed and realized what she must do.  She knealed down and 
showed him the maximal symbol on her arm. She showed all the scars 
around the symbol. "I wasn't always a maximal." she stood up.
"I was a predacon.  I was with predacons on the ledge that night I 
fell.  We were trying to break into a maximal information bank.  It 
was maximals that fired on me and my friends.  I got into a fight and 
left for dead by my predacon friends.  I was rescued and saved by a 
bot, whom I never saw.  I knew that I could never be a pred again.  I 
changed and became a maximal.  I cut out the pred symbol from my arm 
and put on a maximal insignia." She turned her back to him.
"That's why I went bollistic in the hostage situation.  I can't stand 
preds. I hate them down to my very core." She turned and looked at 
Striker. "Ramulus knows for I told him all this already.  He was able 
to see past my past and still accept me.  Can you do the same?"

She prayed that he wouldn't hold her past against her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> GTG for now.
> 
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shruggs, not noticing that he might have offended 
Spears. "I'd like 
> to go back there. I have friends waiting for me."
> 
> His eyes widen as he realizes what he had said, "I'm sorry, I 
shouldn't have 
> said that."
